## DM6


```{r}
dm6 <- read.table("DM6_full_table.tsv", header = FALSE, sep = "\t", fill = TRUE)
names(dm6) <- c("Busco_id", "Status", "Sequence", "Gene_Start", "Gene_End", "Strand", "Score", "Length")
dm6[1:3, ]
table(dm6$Status)

dm6 <- dm6 |> dplyr::filter( Status == "Complete")
table(dm6$Status)
```
